data.description:
FIGHT with any weapon you can find against different enemies in the Hex7 Arenas. 
DEFEND yourself with shield and sword and don't forget to RELOAD your guns once in awhile.
![{"height":1440,"type":"image","width":2560}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/39031640_1611492052972544_8434024045580790583_n.png?_nc_cat=111&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=_u6tNV4bP0YQ7kNvgFiD30x&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYAEqQcMsd-cKGZtN0fLC8f4phWK3JPW4yii7boa1DKJuw&oe=66DEF00C)
SURVIVE the first 7 ROUNDS.
Have FUN customizing your game as much as you like.
![{"height":1440,"type":"image","width":2560}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/39035393_1502492917145105_2500292279720560247_n.png?_nc_cat=110&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=vIdwf36RqQ8Q7kNvgHkeM6r&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYCjiF4FUSnW2Q9JT5eEiBVzkxD7ODHHxL7jEZVZyMXMtw&oe=66DEEE1F)
EXPLORE the Arenas and enjoy the different game modes.
![{"height":1440,"type":"image","width":2560}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/75392879_331169873202633_892518978300243902_n.png?_nc_cat=100&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=a8-E4uLIX-QQ7kNvgFMYowC&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYCzDqGaRCVIDH1q3iJMuRu6LY-2JIcmmHl86kAWi8i2BA&oe=66DED371)
